title: Bluetooth BLE scanner for wear
summary: Scan ibeacons, ble tags, other wearables, eddystone using android wear PRO V.
description: Find all Bluetooth Low Energy (Bluetooth 4.0 or Bluetooth Smart) devices around you. It displays detailed information that Bluetooth Low Energy devices advertisement content, device name, signal strength (RSSI), services & characteristics(it can even read characteristic data). This is through the convenience of your android wear watch.*This is designed for Developers, People who want to find their BLE devices like Fitbit, Mi wearable, BLE speakers,Oppo o-click and smart watches and for the curious.This will work with ibeacons as well. You can even put an ibeacon on your pet.You will be surprise how many BLE devices around you in publicnote: Pro version will only have the watch app and not the companion app for instructions.Free version is also available when you only need the signal finder feature.
descriptionHTML:
Find all Bluetooth Low Energy (Bluetooth 4.0 or Bluetooth Smart) devices around you.
It displays detailed information that Bluetooth Low Energy devices advertisement content, device name, signal strength (RSSI), services & characteristics(it can even read characteristic data). This is through the convenience of your android wear watch.

*This is designed for Developers, People who want to find their BLE devices like Fitbit, Mi wearable, BLE speakers,Oppo o-click and smart watches and for the curious.

This will work with ibeacons as well. You can even put an ibeacon on your pet.

You will be surprise how many BLE devices around you in public

note: Pro version will only have the watch app and not the companion app for instructions.

Free version is also available when you only need the signal finder feature.
comments: Unable to Scroll BLE characteristics on Moto360. Pls help
Simple and sweet Just how things should be.
